sentence.content: A Hermosa Beach minister who for years has tried in vain to quell rumors tying his church to the McMartin Pre-School scandal announced Sunday that the "extreme stress" of fallout from the case has forced him to seek disability retirement.

sentence.content: The Rev. John D. Eales of St. Cross Episcopal Church -- where McMartin pupils claimed they had been forced to take part in satanic rituals -- told the congregation during his sermon that, "after much prayer and consultation," he realized his health could not withstand the continuing harassment and vandalization the church has borne as a result of the unsubstantiated claims.

sentence.content: The McMartin case, which prompted the longest and most expensive criminal trial in U.S. history, ended Thursday with the acquittal of defendants Ray Buckey and Peggy McMartin Buckey on a total of 52 counts of child molestation at the Manhattan Beach school.

chunking.string: Said Ron Russell , a 16-year member of the congregation : `` We brought a good , strong man in here , and -- well , this has ruined him
the congregation : `` We brought a good , strong man in here , and -- well , this has ruined him

referenced.string: The Rev. John D. Eales of St. Cross Episcopal Church -- where McMartin pupils claimed they had been forced to take part in satanic rituals --

mention.string: the church , who was charged with molesting two teen-age boys he had met through his work at St. Cross

referenced.string: the fold about a year and a half earlier by an assistant pastor who was hired after the McMartin case broke

mention.string: kind of like a violin string -- you can only tighten it so far and then it snaps
